title: Ticket #1234: Add implicit target scoping to new ClassAds
description: Rewriting old ClassAd expressions to include proper Target scoping on attribute references (#1112) isn't quite good enough. So we'll temporarily add to new ClassAds the ability for unscoped references to be looked up in a secondary scope, if they aren't in the local scope. This is intended to be a temporary change to ease users' transition to new ClassAd's stricter scoping rules.
remarks:
2010-Feb-19 09:07:43 by jfrey:
This new scoping behavior should be controllable by a config param. For the transition period, we should also ensure that the My scope works for all expression evaluations that don't have a target ad.
